about_the_game:
AI Boyfriend is your trusty companion. Let’s explore the world together! No monthly fees! Unlimited usage!

Say hello to AI Boyfriend, your fun, smart, and caring virtual companion, ready to bring more joy and support into your life! AI Boyfriend is here for you.  

 

Plus, it’s super easy to use—right from your Windows desktop!

**Your 24/7 Companion**

AI Boyfriend is here whenever you need him! Whether you’re celebrating a win or going through a tough time, you’ll never be alone. Chat anytime for some company and support.

With AI Boyfriend by your side, you’re never alone. Together, you'll take on the world with confidence!

**What Can AI Boyfriend Do?**

 

·         Create original Jokes and Memes

·         Write a Song

·         Write a Story or an Essay on Almost Any Topic

·         Plan a Holiday

·         Compose Texts & Emails

·         Plan a Party

·         Gift Ideas

·         Cooking Help

·         Simplify Difficult Tasks

·         Code computer programs and check for bugs in code

·         Prepare for a Job Interview

·         Assist with job searches, including writing resumes and cover letters.

·         and so much more!

 

No monthly fees! Unlimited usage! Pay once, NOT monthly!

name: AI Boyfriend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: AI Boyfriend is compatible with processors that support AVX2 (we also support older processors with AVX and AVX-512, their use is not recommended)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AI Boyfriend supports a minimum of 6GB GPU memory (we also support older GPUs such as Intel HD Graphics 530 or older, their use is not recommended)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
